name: POLICE CHASE (itch) (Devarya, richardsondavid)
description:
Get chased by the cops in this early version of a cat and mouse chase between you and the law. 

W A S D : to move the car

Space : Handbrake

R : to respawn to start if you get stuck 

Credits : 

Devarya : Level Design and code

David :  Code and character setup

Most of the art was imported assets.

Made for Build A Toy class by Professor Csongor Baranyai 

University of Europe for Applied Sciences
